name: Crossing (Choroh)
description:
Logic game Crossing. About the game

Choosing a character - put him in the boat. There is an arrow crossing to the far shore. When the boat reaches the other shore, the character will disembark. A down arrow will appear to return to the starting shore. So you need to translate all the characters observing the conditions. The number of flights is unlimited, but only one character can be transported per flight
